body: When a hacker is spawnkilling in Nexus, are we allowed to combat log?
body_tagged: When a hacker is spawnkilling in Nexus, are we allowed to combat log?
title: Quick question about logging

replies.body: Quick question about the server booting us? What in the world is going on? been booted 1000 times today - so have everyone else. does anyone have an idea?
replies.body_tagged: Quick question about the server booting us? What in the world is going on? been booted 1000 times today - so have everyone else. does anyone have an idea?

replies.body:
You are allowed to combat log to avoid someone breaking a rule yes.

As a rule of thumb though don't do it if you think someone is hacking, you may be wrong. Try to stick to facts "this person is spawnkilling" rather than opinions "this person might be hacking" when logging.
replies.body_tagged:
You are allowed to combat log to avoid someone breaking a rule yes.

As a rule of thumb though don't do it if you think someone is hacking, you may be wrong. Try to stick to facts "this person is spawnkilling" rather than opinions "this person might be hacking" when logging.

replies.body: Thanks :) And gratz for gold rank!
replies.body_tagged: Thanks :) And gratz for gold rank!
